summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing the sale and removal of certain timber in the SW 1/4 Section 21 and NE 1/4 Section 28, Township 22 North, Range 9 East, W.M., SW 1/4 SE 1/4 Section 27, Township 22 North, Range 10 East, W.M. and the NE 1/4 SW 1/4 Section 5, Township 21 North, Range 11 East, W.M., in the Cedar River Watershed under contract with the Mountain Tree Farm Company.
